nodes.text: The Harron Marches were a sector located in the Slice portion of the Expansion Region. By 0 ABY, the Marches bordered the Belasco sector spinward. The sector also formed a four-way border with the Askarian, Circarpous, and Harron sectors at its southern edge as well as a four-way border with the Askarian, Hangshan, and Serathrace sector at its western reaches. The Harron Marches contained the Bruvia system, which shared its name with the Bruvian social group.

The Harron Marches were established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas. The sector was depicted on a map designed by Modi and published in the 2012 StarWars.com article "Essential Atlas Extra: Expansion Region."
